channel.title: ~ Mods PLEASE STICKY/PIN! ~ Please read! :) ~ ACTIVE
channel.description:
I'm not sure how clear this is to people who have very helpful or good topics that have alot of people asking questions or posting in. I knwo whats it's like to have so much school and homework and sports, and family issues, because I have to deal with them too. I just wanted to say that if you have a topic or two, just TRY and post in it daily :o. If not possible, ask a friend or family member to do it FOR you. I'm not sure if thats allowed or not, but maybe they have an account on this website and post daily, then again: just ask THEM! I hope that everyone will read this and follow it as best as possible.
~Froggy
P.S. to all forum mods: I think this would be good to pin.
